title: David Ortiz shows why heâ€™s not regretting retirement
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email David Ortiz shows why heâ€™s not regretting retirement "This is my spring training." Post to Facebook David Ortiz shows why heâ€™s not regretting retirement "This is my spring training."  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/david-ortiz-retired-red-sox-spring-training-beach/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   David Ortiz shows why heâ€™s not regretting retirement Andrew Joseph 6:10 p.m. ET Feb. 19, 2017 
Screenshot (Photo: Twitter) 
Former Red Sox slugger David Ortiz retired after one of the best seasons in his 20-year MLB career. 
As he was putting up All-Star numbers, many thought Ortiz would reconsider retirement because he clearly had a lot of quality baseball left in him. He didn't budge on that retirement. The Red Sox reported to spring training camp last week, and Ortiz wasn't there. 
He is retired, and he's doing what retired baseball players should do during spring training. He's lounging on a beach. My spring training ðŸ˜Ž pic.twitter.com/6efcdohjlJ â€” David Ortiz (@davidortiz) February 19, 2017 
"This is my spring training," Ortiz said. 
Yeah, that looks a lot better than spring training. He's not coming back any time soon. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/david-ortiz-retired-red-sox-spring-training-beach/ Most Popular
